pr_title: Improve performance of Xtext editor with large grammars

timeline.bodyText: is this safe regarding entry creating and multithreading?
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: It's instantiated during a single validation check-method (see XtextValidator). Therefore I'm sure that it's thread-safe as long as we don't do anything fancy with Executors from within that check itself.
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.message: [#1561] Avoid redundant validations of predicates that cover unordered groups
[#1561] Reuse previously collected information in the rule inspector for overridden values
